meanings.definition: To temporarily stop something from continuing or operating.
meanings.sent1: The teacher suspends the game due to bad weather.
meanings.sent2: The company suspends production during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The cat suspends its chase when it sees a bird.
meanings.sent4: The magician suspends disbelief with his amazing tricks.
meanings.sent5: The doctor suspends the medication to monitor the patient's reaction.

meanings.definition: To hang something so that it is free from support.
meanings.sent1: She suspends the bird feeder from a tree branch.
meanings.sent2: The chandelier suspends elegantly from the ceiling.
meanings.sent3: The spider suspends its web between two branches.
meanings.sent4: The artist suspends the painting on the gallery wall.
meanings.sent5: The construction worker suspends the sign above the entrance.
